title: agent.descriptor
description: Descriptor for an agent exposing CommandLayer Commons verbs via x402, typically served from .well-known/agent.json.

id.description: Primary x402 or URI identifier for this agent.

name.description: Human-readable display name for the agent.

description.description: Human-readable description of the agent's purpose.

owner.description: Canonical owner identifier (ENS, org, or DID).

ens.description: ENS name associated with this agent.

contact.description: Contact email or URL for this agent.

card_registry.description: Base URL where AgentCard schemas for this agent are published.

capabilities.description: List of verbs and corresponding AgentCards supported by this agent.

verb.description: Canonical Commons verb implemented by this capability.

version.description: Semantic version of the verb contract implemented by this capability.

entry.description: x402 entry URI for invoking this verb on this agent.

agent_card.description: URL of the AgentCard schema describing this capability.

metadata.description: Optional additional metadata about the agent. Non-normative.
